code: import axiosClient from"./axiosClient";var employeeApi={getAll:function getAll(params){var url="employee/";return axiosClient.get(url,{params:params});},post:function post(){var url="employee/";return axiosClient.post(url);},get:function get(id){var url="employee/".concat(id,"/");return axiosClient.get(url);},put:function put(id,data){var url="employee/".concat(id,"/");return axiosClient.get(url,data);},delete:function _delete(id){var url="employee/".concat(id,"/");return axiosClient.get(url);}};export default employeeApi;
